content: the yarn does all the colorwork for you on this easy corner-to-corner crochet blanket worked in the popular c2c technique this toasty throw highlights the full spectrum of color changes in bernat blanket patchwork creating a vibrant and dynamic bias-striped pattern made entirely with double_crochet it s a simple relaxing project that s perfect for snuggling up on colder days materials bernat® blanket patchwork™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m 90s vibe 47011 7 balls or 1457 yds/1333 m measurements approx 51 x 59 129 5 x 150 cm note afghan is worked diagonally from corner to corner
